quotes.quote: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Quality is not what happens when what you do matches your intentions. It is what happens when what you do matches your customers' expectations.
quotes.author: Guaspari

quotes.quote: Quality is the result of a carefully constructed cultural environment. It has to be the fabric of the organization, not part of the fabric.
quotes.author: Philip Crosby

quotes.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, intelligent direction and skillful execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives.
quotes.author: William A. Foster

quotes.quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Quality is free. It's not a gift, but it's free. The 'unquality' things are what cost money.
quotes.author: Philip B. Crosby

quotes.quote: Things of quality have no fear of time.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If you believe in unlimited quality and act in all your business dealings with total integrity, the rest will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Frank Perdue

quotes.quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you want a quality, act as if you already had it.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Give them quality. That's the best kind of advertising.
quotes.author: Milton Hersey

quotes.quote: Quality is the best business plan.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Quality questions create a quality life. Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The quality of an organization can never exceed the quality of the minds that make it up.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Quality, quality, quality: never waver from it, even when you don't see how you can afford to keep it up. When you compromise, you become a commodity and then you die.
quotes.author: Gary Hirshberg

quotes.quote: Quality isn't something that can be argued into an article or promised into it. It must be put there. If it isn't put there, the finest sales talk in the world won't act as a substitute.
quotes.author: C. G. Campbell

quotes.quote: Quality is a proud and soaring thing.
quotes.author: Jessica Julian

quotes.quote: The bitterness of poor quality remains long after low pricing is forgotten!
quotes.author: Leon M. Cautillo

quotes.quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: It is the quality of our work which will please God and not the quantity.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Quality has to be caused, not controlled.
quotes.author: Philip Crosby

quotes.quote: Quality in a product or service is not what the supplier puts in. It is what the customer gets out and is willing to pay for. A product is not quality because it is hard to make and costs a lot of money, as manufacturers typically believe. This is incompetence. Customers pay only for what is of use to them and gives them value. Nothing else constitutes quality.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Quality is a direct experience independent of and prior to intellectual abstractions.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Quality is such an attractive banner that sometimes we think we can get away with just waving it, without doing the hard work necessary to achieve it.
quotes.author: Philip B. Crosby

quotes.quote: Make the workmanship surpass the materials.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: In the race for quality, there is no finish line
quotes.author: David T. Kearns

quotes.quote: Quantum physics tells us that no matter how thorough our observation of the present, the (unobserved) past, like the future, is indefinite and exists only as a spectrum of possibilities.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: [Q]uantum physics is not replaced by another sort of physics at large scales. It actually gives rise to classical physics. Our everyday, commonsense reality is, in this view, simply what quantum mechanics looks like when you’re six feet tall.
quotes.author: Phillip Ball

quotes.quote: Quantum physics is certainly imposing, but an inner voice tells me that it is not yet the real thing. The theory says a lot. But doesn’t really bring us any closer to the secret of the old one. I, at any rate, I’m convinced that he does not throw dice.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If anybody says he can think about quantum physics without getting giddy, that only shows he has not understood the first thing about them.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Quantum physics is one of the hardest things to understand intuitively, because essentially the whole point is that our classical picture is wrong.
quotes.author: Neil Turok

quotes.quote: I'm a big believer in quantum physics, which says that the universe is more incredible and mysterious than any of us can imagine, which is my way of saying, 'Anything is possible, including angels.
quotes.author: Caroline Leavitt

quotes.quote: Quantum physics is a bit of a passion of mine. It's extraordinary. There's a branch of mathematics that is based on lunacy, and that's wonderful.
quotes.author: Bob Hoskins

quotes.quote: Quantum physics teaches us that we can simultaneously exist in many places, under certain conditions.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Theology, philosophy, metaphysics, and quantum physics are merely ways for God to have his smart people believe in him
quotes.author: Jeremy Aldana

quotes.quote: Quantum physics tells us nothing that is observed is unaffected by the observer, that statement, from science holds an enamours and powerful insight. It means that everyone sees a different truth, because everyone is creating what they see.
quotes.author: Neal Donald Walsh

quotes.quote: Quantum physics is teaching us that particles themselves don’t create particles. It’s just what Jesus said 2000 years ago, that it’s the spirit that gives life and that you don’t get particles from more particles.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: What quantum physics teaches us is that everything we thought was physical is not physical
quotes.author: Bruce H. Lipton

quotes.quote: Quantum Physics provides us with a striking illustration of the fact that we can fully understand a connection though we can only speak of it in images and parables.
quotes.author: Werner Heisenber

quotes.quote: And a new philosophy emerged called quantum physics which suggest that the individual’s function is to inform and be informed. You really exist only when you’re in a field sharing and exchanging information. You create the realities you inhabit.
quotes.author: Timothy Li

quotes.quote: Quantum physics fluctuates all the time. But now the fluctuations are not just particle coming into and out of existence, which happens all the time. It’s whole universe coming into and out of existence.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Quantum physics thus reveals a basic oneness of the universe
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.quote: After the conversations about Indian philosophy, some of the ideas of Quantum Physics that had seemed so crazy suddenly made much more sense.
quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

quotes.quote: Quantum physics really begins to point to this discovery. It says that you can't have a Universe without mind entering into it, and that the mind is actually shaping the very thing that is being perceived.
quotes.author: Fred Alan Wolf

quotes.quote: In the old physics, three times two equals six and two times three equals 6 are reversible propositions. Not in quantum physics. Three times two and two times three are two different matters, distinct and separate propositions.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: In quantum physics, the study of material at the subatomic level, you get down to the tiniest levels. When they take these subatomic particles, put them in particle accelerators and collide them, quantum physicists discover there's nothing there. There's no one home - no ghost in the machine.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Quantum physics has found that there is no empty space in the human cell, but it is a teeming, electric-magnet ic field of possibility or potential
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Life is strong and fragile. It's a paradox... It's both things, like quantum physics: It's a particle and a wave at the same time. It all exists all together.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: What really matters for me is ... the more active role of the observer in quantum physics ... According to quantum physics the observer has indeed a new relation to the physical events around him in comparison with the classical observer, who is merely a spectator.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Pauli

quotes.quote: All the quantum physics experiments have occurred chiefly on the atomic scale and we are taught to believe that nature's laws are consistent.
quotes.author: Mitch Horowitz

quotes.quote: I think science and spirituality are one and the same, I don't think they're really different...quantum physics is validating all kinds of spiritual teachings.
quotes.author: Jennifer Beals

quotes.quote: Quantum Physics has explained all of chemistry and most of physics
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.quote: For many years quantum physics had been giving indications that there are levels of reality other than the material level.
quotes.author: Amit Goswami

quotes.quote: Memories are not recycled like atoms and particles in quantum physics; they can be lost forever.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: I decided to explore randomness and some of the principles of quantum mechanics, through poetry using the medium of sheep.
quotes.author: Valerie Laws

quotes.quote: The quarterback is the leader of the team and the quarterback is the one that has the ball in his hands every single play.
quotes.author: Andy Dalton

quotes.quote: The quarterback is an extension of the coach and has a certain type of swagger mentality, on and off the field.
quotes.author: Cam Newton

quotes.quote: Any time you can do that and the quarterback shows some outward emotion some negative emotion you know you are in his head and you've affected him. It's satisfying.
quotes.author: Bobby Carpenter

quotes.quote: Quarterback is not a position that you come in having not played it your whole life.
quotes.author: Warren Moon

quotes.quote: That's the key to defending any quarterback: to make them throw before they want to throw.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: If you're a quarterback, you want everything on your shoulders. You want to be the one to make the decisions.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: Every quarterback can throw a ball; every running back can run; every receiver is fast; but that mental toughness that you talk about translates into competitiveness.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: Any quarterback that understands what the offense is really about is going to succeed.
quotes.author: Joe Montana

quotes.quote: Quarterback is a lot of footwork. It's mechanics, how you step back, what you do on a trap or power or play action.
quotes.author: James Haynes

quotes.quote: If you're a quarterback, you want everything on your shoulders. You want to be the one to make the decisions.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: A quarterback's best friend is a running game, It's such an advantage for a quarterback when your team has a good running game. It really helps open up the passing game.
quotes.author: Kevin Decker

quotes.quote: Young quarterbacks do well because they have a great defense.
quotes.author: Steve Mariucci

quotes.quote: Quarterbacks are untouchable nowadays. If you hit a quarterback too hard, or if you fall on him with too much weight which is a judgment thing from a professional standpoint you're going to get flagged.
quotes.author: Mario Williams

quotes.quote: In football, it's the ultimate team sport. You have to have good people around you as a quarterback for things to happen.
quotes.author: Warren Moon

quotes.quote: A quarterback that goes out and performs for you and is a franchise quarterback is more valuable than a player playing another position, but there's a lot more risk there. It's a more difficult position to play, and there are lot more failures.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Footwork is the biggest element to any quarterback game because if it's off, it will mess with your mechanics.
quotes.author: Jordan Rodgers

quotes.quote: If the quarterback throws the ball in the endzone and the wide receiver catches it, it's a touchdown.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: The quarterback must go down, and he must go down hard.
quotes.author: Al Davis

quotes.quote: As a quarterback, you have to love it. As much as you like to turn around and hand the ball off the whole traditional football game as a quarterback, you gotta love putting it in the air.
quotes.author: Joe Montana

quotes.quote: Quarterbacks need to make their team better. If it's a bad team, they can even make a bad team better.
quotes.author: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.quote: You never really know about a quarterback until he plays in a real game.
quotes.author: Mike Singletary

quotes.quote: Game day can be emotional, and there are a lot of ups and downs throughout a game, but as a quarterback, you have to be able to see the bigger picture, steady that ship, get all the guys focused in on the task at hand, and keep the thing moving.
quotes.author: Alex Smith

quotes.quote: I realize that as the quarterback, you have to assume some sort of leadership role because you have to talk in the huddle on every play, and you're essentially giving out orders to the team. But in my mind, I have to prove myself on the field before I can start asserting a leadership role.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.quote: You need to make sure you're going exactly where your guy goes in press coverage. In zone, you can read the quarterback and his eyes a bit to determine where he's going. You don't get the opportunity in press coverage to read the quarterback, so it's all on you.
quotes.author: Antonio Cromartie

quotes.quote: Don't let the Monday morning quarterbacks stop you from being bold. You've got to set a high bar.
quotes.author: Antonio Villaraigosa

quotes.quote: If you want to coach you have three rules to follow to win. One, surround yourself with people who can't live without football. I've had a lot of them. Two, be able to recognize winners. They come in all forms. And, three, have a plan for everything. A plan for practice, a plan for the game. A plan for being ahead, and a plan for being behind 20-0 at half, with your quarterback hurt and the phones dead, with it raining cats and dogs and no rain gear because the equipment man left it at home.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: The quarterback is in charge of the chuck wagon. He's handing it out here and there, but he can't just throw it out there indiscriminately or the wolves will get him.
quotes.author: Bill Parcells

quotes.quote: That's one thing you learn as a quarterback: focus. The better you are at focusing and the more you can continue to stay focused for a four-hour stage and really be zeroed in on what is happening, the better you play, the longer you play.
quotes.author: Carson Palmer

quotes.quote: I've never had a quarterback-run-driven offense. We don't run designed plays where we snap the ball directly to the quarterback and he's just running it. If the defense is cheating and overcompensating for your running back, then the quarterback needs to keep (it) honest.
quotes.author: Chip Kelly

quotes.quote: Something you're aware of being a quarterback coming here-you have expectations, and you want to live up to those.
quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Every woman is a queen, and we all have different things to offer.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: The Queen is the only person who can put on a tiara with one hand, while walking down stairs.
quotes.author: Princess Margaret

quotes.quote: The pearl is the queen of gems and the gem of queens.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Never did the world make a queen of a girl who hides in houses and dreams without traveling.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: A King and Queen cannot support a crown with eyes looking down. Their universe expands as far as you can see.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: The strength of a kingdom comes from its King, The strength of a King comes from his Queen.
quotes.author: Cody Edward Lee Miller

quotes.quote: A queen loves where she must not where she will.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: We are no more free agents than the queen of clubs when she victoriously takes prisoner the knave of hearts.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: Women have been called queens for a long time, but the kingdom given them isn’t worth ruling.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: When it comes to health, diet is the Queen, but exercise is the King.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Even a pawn can take down a queen
quotes.author: Chanda Hahn

quotes.quote: Content is king, but marketing is queen, and runs the household.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Science packages theory, places it on a throne, and honors and protects it much like a queen. Engineers make the queen come down from the throne and scrub the floor. And if she doesn't work, we fire her.
quotes.author: Robert J. Marks II

quotes.quote: In no man's land, alien is the queen.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The monarchy is so extraordinarily useful. When Britain wins a battle she shouts, God save the Queen; when she loses, she votes down the prime minister.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: If a queen bee were crossed with a Friesian bull, would not the land flow with milk and honey?
quotes.author: Oliver St. John

quotes.quote: A queen is wise. She has earned her serenity, not having had it bestowed on her but having passer her tests. She has suffered and grown more beautiful because of it. She has proved she can hold her kingdom together. She has become its vision. She cares deeply about something bigger than herself. She rules with authentic power.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: A woman with romance in her life lived as grandly as a queen, because her heart was treasured.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: In every woman there is a Queen. Speak to the Queen and the Queen will answer.
quotes.author: Norwegian Proverb

quotes.quote: Money is the sovereign queen of all delights - for her, the lawyer pleads, the soldier fights.
quotes.author: Richard Barnfield

quotes.quote: Sweet Truth is a queen proud and mighty—Her throne is in heaven above.
quotes.author: Ardelia Cotton Barton

quotes.quote: The Queen is by much the most powerful of the forces.
quotes.author: Howard Staunton

quotes.quote: Opinion is the queen of the world.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: To be a queen of a household is a powerful thing.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.quote: A woman wants to rule like a queen by involving herself in all activities of the house; and a man who fools oneself says often that she is multitasking to manage everything well.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: More important than the quest for certainty is the quest for clarity.
quotes.author: Francois Gautier

quotes.quote: In our quest for the answers of life we tend to make order out of chaos, and chaos out of order.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: The great quest of life has always been to discover truth.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: To begin is the most important part of any quest and by far the most courageous.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The quest for freedom, dignity, and the rights of man will never end.
quotes.author: William J. Brennan

quotes.quote: My quests fuel my dreams… my dreams fuel my quests!!
quotes.author: AJ Vosse

quotes.quote: Quests are a huge inconvenience. Don't let anyone tell you differently, even if that person has experience. The problem is that people forget the pain and aggravation as soon as the quest ends successfully, and then they remember only the glorious parts. In this way quests are a bit like childbirth, even to the point of saying that quests often give birth to glory. Maybe.
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.quote: Scientists derive satisfaction from figuring out the puzzle. It's about the quest, not the grail.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: In the presence of love, hearth and quest become one.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: I just feel like I'm on a quest to fail if I try to even compete with myself.
quotes.author: Jenova Chen

quotes.quote: That's the key. The quests are things you need to do for others so that you can learn.
quotes.author: Kaza Kingsley

quotes.quote: Love isn’t the quest anymore; the new quest is the sensuality with which it is practiced.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: You didn’t get the quest you wanted, you got the one you could do.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: The journey is the treasure.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: Always remember, joy is not incidental to spiritual quest. It is vital.
quotes.author: Nachman of Breslov

quotes.quote: The terrible thing about the quest for truth is that you find it.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: There can be no greater good than the quest for peace, and no finer purpose than the preservation of freedom.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: But that shadow has been serving you! What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle. Your boundaries are your quest. You must have shadow and light source both. Listen, and lay your head under the tree of awe.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The quest for peace begins in the home, in the school and in the workplace.
quotes.author: Silvia Cartwright

quotes.quote: The quest of the absolute leads into the four-dimensional world.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Eddington

quotes.quote: Scientists have become the bearers of the torch of discovery in our quest for knowledge.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: The insatiable quest for knowledge is far greater than the quest for worker health and safety.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: I think it is a quest of literature throughout the ages to describe the human condition.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: Adventure works in any strand—it calls to those who care more for living than for their lives.
quotes.author: Amal El-Mohtar

quotes.quote: You are not alone in your quest to be who you want and have what you want.
quotes.author: Chris Prentiss

quotes.quote: The fear of being deceived is the vulgar version of the quest for Truth.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Love, the quest; marriage, the conquest; divorce, the inquest.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Science is a quest for understanding.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Bell Burnell

quotes.quote: My music is part of the quest I have to find new ways of telling stories, and also, I want to inspire people.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: A valid answer comes when the question is lived.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Vongsaravanh

quotes.quote: Question everything, even the question mark, that shepherd's crook floating in the air above that small round rock. If you stubbornly still wish to be unhappy, maybe you can grasp it.
quotes.author: Dick Allen

quotes.quote:
Doubts are good. Confusion is excellent. Questions are awesome.
All these are attempts to expand the wisdom of mind.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: It is better to debate a question without settling it than to settle a question without debating it.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: We get wise by asking questions, and even if these are not answered, we get wise, for a well-packed question carries its answer on its back as a snail carries its shell.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: Never let fear stop you from asking something you don't understand or know. To pretend or to act as if you know is not a wise thing to do.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The wise man doesn't give the right answers, he poses the right questions.
quotes.author: Claude Levi-Strauss

quotes.quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: Asking questions is one of the fundamental keys of learning. It is always better to ask a question than pretend you understand.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The smart ones ask when they don’t know. And, sometimes, when they do.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Questions are never indiscreet, answers sometimes are.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Everything we know has its origins in questions. Questions, we might say, are the principal intellectual instruments available to human beings.
quotes.author: Neil Postman

quotes.quote: When someone asks a question, don’t assume they don’t know the answer. Clever people will always test you.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: It is really quite impossible to be affirmative about anything which one refuses to question; one is doomed to remain inarticulate about anything which one hasn't, by an act of the imagination, made one's own.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Some questions cannot be answered. They become familiar weights in the hand, round stones pulled from the pocket, unyielding and cool.
quotes.author: Jane Hirshfield

quotes.quote: Questions give us no rest. We know not why our curse makes us seek we know not what, ever and ever. But we cannot resist it. It whispers to us that there are great things on this earth of ours, and that we must know them.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: There are no ugly questions except those clothed in condescension.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Every question possessed a power that did not lie in the answer.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Questions are the golden keys that unlock hearts and minds.
quotes.author: Bob Tiede

quotes.quote: If you want the answer, ask the question.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: The question is the answer.
quotes.author: Thomas Vato

quotes.quote: The big question is whether you are going to be able to say a hearty yes to your adventure.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The important thing is never to stop questioning.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Asking the right question and listening to the answer is a great relationship builder, which is important to the persuasion process.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A prudent question is one-half of wisdom.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: One who never asks either knows everything or nothing.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: It is not every question that deserves an answer.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: All values in this world are more or less questionable, but the most important thing in life is human kindness.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quotes.quote: Whatever we think about and question a lot becomes questionable.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is questionable if all the mechanical inventions yet made have lightened the day's toil of any human being.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: One must shy away from questionable undertakings, even when they bear a high-sounding name.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The world has always been uncertain. This is the nature of the world.
quotes.author: Pierre Nanterme

quotes.quote: Controversial' as we all know, is often a euphemism for 'interesting and intelligent.
quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: If you're not controversial, you'll never break through the din of all the commentary.
quotes.author: Roger Stone

quotes.quote: Controversial means somebody who makes people think. And if you are afraid of people who will be against you, you might as well stay home and do nothing.
quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

quotes.quote: Having a relationship with people of questionable character is like playing with a razor blade on your skin, and pretending to observe that it is harmful to your body.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey

quotes.quote: Natural talent is a questionable phenomenon. Inclination perhaps, but innate ability is extremely rare.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: When the next step is unclear, the best way to figure it out is to take action. Constant motion is the key to execution.
quotes.author: Scott Belsky

quotes.quote: We doubt that any facts actually exist. We only have observations and interpretations. Most of the interpretations remain questionable.
quotes.author: Peter J. Carroll

quotes.quote: The least questioned assumptions are often the most questionable.
quotes.author: Paul Broca

quotes.quote: It is important to have questionable friends you can trust unconditionally.
quotes.author: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.quote: The planet will survive. Whether we get to be here and enjoy it, or enjoy life as we've known it, is what's questionable.
quotes.author: Ted Danson

quotes.quote: Verbosity leads to unclear, inarticulate things.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: It's not controversial to say that human activity is contributing in some way. The question is how serious that is.
quotes.author: Bobby Jindal

quotes.quote: It's better to be controversial for the right reasons, than to be popular for the wrong reasons.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.quote: Controversial proposals, once accepted, soon become hallowed.
quotes.author: Dean Acheson

quotes.quote: Questioning is the piety of thought.
quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

quotes.quote: Openly questioning the way the world works and challenging the power of the powerful is not an activity customarily rewarded.
quotes.author: Dale Spender

quotes.quote: The question is not what we intended ourselves to be, but what He intended us to be when He made us.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Certainly you will have doubts. There will be questionings and faith will return again. That is how faith is established.
quotes.author: Sarada Devi

quotes.quote: The second you stop questioning yourself is the second that you become the monster.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: A mind that questions everything, unless strong enough to bear the weight of its ignorance, risks questioning itself and being engulfed in doubt.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: Persistent questioning and healthy inquisitiveness are the first requisite for acquiring learning of any kind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The answers you get depend on the questions you ask.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Kuhn

quotes.quote: The questioning spirit is the rebellious spirit. A rebellion is always either a cloak to hide a prince, or the swaddling wrapper of a new rule.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The first key to wisdom is assiduous and frequent questioning.
quotes.author: Peter Abelard

quotes.quote: We grow up never questioning that which is unquestioned around us.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: The path to holiness lies through questioning everything.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Whenever you are questioning a person's desire for something, consider what he does, not necessarily what he says.
quotes.author: David J. Lieberman

quotes.quote: Questioning is not the mode of conversation among gentlemen.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The very act of questioning whether you exist proves you do, because you must be there for the doubt to be entertained in the first place.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: Questioning our stressful thoughts, we come to see they're not true.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: The questions you ask consistently will create either enervation or enjoyment, indignation or inspiration, misery or magic. Ask the questions that will uplift your spirit and push you along the path of human excellence.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Most people ask questions because they want to know the answer; lawyers are trained never to ask questions unless they already know the answer.
quotes.author: Lani Guinier

quotes.quote: Questioning growth is deemed to be the act of lunatics, idealists and revolutionaries. But question it we must.
quotes.author: Tim Jackson

quotes.quote: The key to wisdom is this -- constant and frequent questioning ... for by doubting we are led to question and by questioning we arrive at the truth.
quotes.author: Peter Abelard

quotes.quote: Disability doesn't make you exceptional, but questioning what you think you know about it does.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: Be confident, and just do it. It's all about not questioning what everyone else is thinking, since they're probably looking to others to know what is or isn't cool.
quotes.author: Zoe Kravitz

quotes.quote: If it's worth listening to, it's worth questioning until you understand it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Questioning the ostensibly unquestionable premises of our way of life is arguably the most urgent of services we owe our fellow humans and ourselves.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existence. One cannot help but be in awe when he contemplates the mysteries of eternity, of life, of the marvelous structure of reality. It is enough if one tries merely to comprehend a little of this mystery each day.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To contact the deeper truth of who we are, we must engage in some activity or practice that questions what we assume to be true about ourselves.
quotes.author: A. H. Almaas

quotes.quote: Art is the questioning of culture.
quotes.author: Gerard Mortier

quotes.quote: You can question somebody's views and their judgment without questioning their motives or patriotism.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: You really get tired in one area of your life, and then you start questioning your whole existence.
quotes.author: Seth Avett

quotes.quote: Respect authority while questioning it.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Be quick to learn and wise to know.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Quickness is the essence of the war.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: A quick cure is a quack cure.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Quick decisions are unsafe decisions.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Quick believers need broad shoulders.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No man is quick enough to enjoy life to the full.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Better to know the quick pain of truth than the ongoing pain of a long-held false hope.
quotes.author: Trudi Canavan

quotes.quote: Quick riches are more dangerous than poverty.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Be quick to do good. If you are slow, the mind, delighting in mischief, will catch you.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: We are too quick to imitate depraved examples.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Youth is quick in feeling but weak in judgement.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Intelligence is quickness in seeing things as they are.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Who makes quick use of the moment is a genius of prudence.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: The only people who have quick answers don't have the responsibility of making the decisions.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.quote: Men were always quick to believe in the madness of women.
quotes.author: Alison Goodman

quotes.quote: Quick sensitivity is inseperable from a ready understanding.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: People see the wrongness in an idea much quicker that the rightness.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: There are no quick wins in business - it takes years to become an overnight success.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Quick gratification of desires, often lead to low stratifications in life.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: In the soil of the quick fix is the seed of a new problem, because our quiet wisdom is unavailable.
quotes.author: Wayne Muller

quotes.quote: A quick temper will make a fool of you soon enough.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: We are quick to rationalize our entertainment and priorities yet are slow to commit to serving God.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: Let us be quick to repent of injuries while repentance may not be a barren anguish.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Be quick to resolve conflicts before they mature to become wars. The energetic crocodile was once a delicate egg!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We are all quick to point out all the differences but not as willing to accept what bonds us as humans.
quotes.author: Faran Tahir

quotes.quote: The quickest way to become troubled is to be concerned with what people are gonna say about your life and your work.
quotes.author: Ahmad Jamal

quotes.quote: We are too quick to live this life and forget that there is another world to come...this is not the end.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: How quick and rushing life can sometimes seem, when at the same time it's so slow and sweet and everlasting.
quotes.author: Graham Swift

quotes.quote: Be quick, but don't hurry.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Quickness means you are hustling.
quotes.author: Ehab Atalla

quotes.quote: A fool is known by his speech; and a wise man by silence.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A quiet man is a thinking man. A quiet woman is usually mad.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: An inability to stay quiet is one of the conspicuous failings of mankind.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Quiet is peace. Tranquility. Quiet is turning down the volume knob on life. Silence is pushing the off button. Shutting it down. All of it.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Sweet are the thoughts that savour of content. The quiet mind is richer than a crown.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Quiet and silence is a form of power. Thoughtful and wise people are not talkative people.
quotes.author: Dr. T.P. Chia

quotes.quote: Silence is often misinterpreted, but never misquoted. We should all learn just to be quiet at times.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When I am silent, I have thunder hidden inside.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Cultivate solitude and quiet and a few sincere friends, rather than mob merriment, noise and thousands of nodding acquaintances.
quotes.author: William Powell

quotes.quote: Only in quiet waters do things mirror themselves undistorted. Only in a quiet mind is adequate perception of the world.
quotes.author: Hans Margolius

quotes.quote: Be silent as to services you have rendered, but speak of favours you have received.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Just because you don't say much doesn't mean people don't notice you. It's actually the quiet ones who often draw the most attention. There's this constant whirlwind of motion and sound all around, and then there's the quiet one, the eye of the storm.
quotes.author: Amy Efaw

quotes.quote: Who cannot understand your silence, cannot understand your words.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: In teamwork, silence isn't golden, it's deadly.
quotes.author: Mark Sanborn

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is the quiet observer who sees the most.
quotes.author: Kathryn L. Nelson

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's best to stay quiet. The silence can speak volumes without ever saying a word.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Surely silence can sometimes be the most eloquent reply.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib R.A

quotes.quote: We need quiet time to examine our lives openly and honestly - spending quiet time alone gives your mind an opportunity to renew itself and create order.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversations.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: How rare it is to find a soul quiet enough to hear God speak.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Live quietly in the moment and see the beauty of all before you. The future will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: When she is quiet, there is a reason. She is sorting through all the chaos in her head and all the madness in her heart.
quotes.author: LLK

quotes.quote: We need quiet time to examine our lives openly and honestly - spending quiet time alone gives your mind an opportunity to renew itself and create order.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: I'm a busy guy but I set aside quiet time every morning and every evening to keep my equilibrium centered on my own path. I don't like being swayed by anything that might be negative or damaging
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: It's nice, when fishing, to catch a fish. But it doesn't really matter if you don't. What you always catch is a quiet time sitting at the water's edge, or in a gently rocking boat, a silent time of water and sky and the movement of natural things.
quotes.author: Ruth Rudner

quotes.quote: I get clarity through quiet time, reflection, reading, and meditation. Finding the space between thoughts gives me the energy to take on new challenges with enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Jaime Murray

quotes.quote: The most important habit is solitude, quiet time. People who enter their day by taking 45 minutes or an hour for themselves - meditation, prayer, inspirational reading, taking a walk - before they go for it in the real world do best.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Nothing increases happiness like quiet time. The truth is, the only moments that make you laugh or happy are seconds of stillness.
quotes.author: Russell Summons

quotes.quote: Hair and makeup has become part of my pre-competition routine. It's a quiet time, when I can reflect, I can put on some music - and I can mentally get in the zone of performance.
quotes.author: Tessa Virtue

quotes.quote: Aeroplane journeys give me quiet time to read and sleep; it's like being unplugged from the earth.
quotes.author: Linda Gray

quotes.quote: I imagine I appear very outgoing, and I do enjoy people and parties and being involved in life. I am also a very private person, and I value my quiet time. I think people assume I am just a party animal, and in truth, I need to recharge my battery just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.quote: For my mind, I try to reduce stress by finding quiet time and meditating.
quotes.author: Josh Mcdermitt

quotes.quote: In the laughing times we know that we are lucky, and in the quiet times we know that we are blessed. And we will not be alone.
quotes.author: Dar Williams

quotes.quote: I need the spiritual revival that comes from spending quiet time alone with Jesus in prayer and in thoughtful meditation on His Word.
quotes.author: Anne Graham Lotz

quotes.quote: The prayer offered to God in the morning during your quiet time is the key that unlocks the door of the day. Any athlete knows that it is the start that ensures a good finish.
quotes.author: Adrian Rogers

quotes.quote: Solitude is very different from a 'time-out' from our busy lives. Solitude is the very ground from which community grows. Whenever we pray alone, study, read, write, or simply spend quiet time away from the places where we interact with each other directly, we are potentially opened for a deeper intimacy with each other.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: I try to get in quiet time and book time, but really, the only time I ever get that is when I'm on an airplane - I have a fear of flying, but I actually love flying because it's the only time I can sleep, and it's the only time I get to read.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: I like my quiet time. There is a writer's sensibility in me sometimes, where I step back.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I'm an early bird, partly because I like to have some quiet time and partly because by 9am emails begin arriving, the phone starts ringing and I have dragons to kill of one sort or another.
quotes.author: Andrew Motion

quotes.quote: Night is a more quiet time to work. It aids thought.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Reading helps me be more creative, it helps my imagination and I like the fact that it gives me some quiet time.
quotes.author: Rey Mysterio

quotes.quote: Age puzzles me. I thought it was a quiet time. My seventies were interesting and fairly serene, but my eighties are passionate. I grow more intense as I age.
quotes.author: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quotes.quote: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: There are times when silence is the best way to yell at the top of your voice.
quotes.author: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.quote: It's not enough to be quiet. Quietness is the absence of noise. We need peace, the presence of justice and to be - and so people here can coexist and live together.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Quietness is the beginning of virtue. To be silent is to be beautiful. Stars do not make a noise.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: Silence propagates itself, and the longer talk has been suspended, the more difficult it is to find anything to say.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Silence often expresses 'more powerfully than speech the verdict and judgment of society.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: My heart is tuned to the quietness that the stillness of nature inspires.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: The silence often of pure innocence persuades when speaking fails.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: After an argument, silence may mean acceptance or the continuation of resistance by other means.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: In quietness we find inner peace.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: As we practice meditation, we get used to stillness and eventually are able to make friends with the quietness of our sensations.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Silence holds the door against the strife of tongue and all the impertinences of idle conversation.
quotes.author: James Hervey

quotes.quote: Silence is the great teacher and to learn its lessons you must pay attention to it. There is no substitute for the creative inspiration, knowledge, and stability that come from knowing how to contact your core of inner silence.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Silence is a trick when it imposes. Pedants and scholars, churchmen and physicians, abound in silent pride.
quotes.author: John Zimmerman

quotes.quote: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Learn silence. With the quiet serenity of a meditative mind, listen, absorb, transcribe, and transform.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Silence is as full of potential wisdom and wit as the unshown marble of great sculpture. The silent bear no witness against themselves.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Mentally prepare ourselves for excellence...block out the noise of everyday distractions and tap into the quietness of meaningful focus, intent and a winning mindset.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: Silence is sometimes the only way to share the unsharable.
quotes.author: Ron McLarty

quotes.quote: To me so deep a silence portends some dread event; a clamorous sorrow wastes itself in sound.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Silence fertilizes the deep place where personality grows. A life with a peaceful center can weather all storms.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Silence is the safest response for all the contradiction that arises from impertinence, vulgarity, or envy.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quotes.quote: All that is important comes in quietness and waiting.
quotes.author: Patrick Lindsay

quotes.quote: The true lasting quietness comes from a complete consecration to the Divine.
quotes.author: Mirra Alfassa

quotes.quote: Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Quietness is an essential part of all awareness. In quiet times and sleepy times, a child can dwell in thoughts of his own, and in songs and stories of his own.
quotes.author: Margaret Wise Brown

quotes.quote: True inward quietness ... is not vacancy, but stability - the steadfastness of a single purpose.
quotes.author: Caroline Emelia Stephen

quotes.quote: If you're on the right side of the issue, just keep driving until you hear glass breaking. Don't quit.
quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

quotes.quote: Desire means never quit.
quotes.author: Jeff Hardy

quotes.quote: You know you can do more, but everyone expects you to quit.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: Rest but never quit. Even the sun has a sinking spell each evening. But it always rises the next morning. At sunrise, every soul is born again.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: No matter what's going on in our lives, the victory is in refusing to quit.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The trouble with most people is that they quit before they start.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The real competition is against the little voice inside you that wants to quit.
quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

quotes.quote: If you can quit, quit. If you can't quit, stop complaining - this is what you chose.
quotes.author: J.A. Konrath

quotes.quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: On tough days, you gotta have heart. Don't quit, whatever you do. Persevere.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: No one wants to quit when he's losing and no one wants to quit when he's winning.
quotes.author: Richard Petty

quotes.quote: Quit while you're ahead. All the best gamblers do.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: The man who wins is the man who hangs on just five minutes longer after everyone else has quit.
quotes.author: Douglas Southall Freeman

quotes.quote: It's okay to fail; it's not okay to quit.
quotes.author: Chris Gardner

quotes.quote: The temptation to quit will be greatest just before you are about to succeed.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: And the best way to quit being concerned with yourself is to be concerned about others.
quotes.author: Florinda Donner

quotes.quote: You can always quit, so why quit now.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed becacuse they are determined to.
quotes.author: George Allen Sr.

quotes.quote: Losers quit when they're tired. Winners quit when they've won.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: People quit people before they quit companies.
quotes.author: David Cottrell

quotes.quote: Great men are just ordinary men that didn't quit.
quotes.author: Tommy Barnett

quotes.quote: We'll succeed unless we quit.
quotes.author: George W Bush

quotes.quote: Winners are not those who never fail, but those who never quit.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: It's human nature to quit when it hurts. But it's that reflex that creates scarcity.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: The only way to fail is to quit.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Before you quit, you have to try.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: If you never quit, you're never beaten.
quotes.author: Elsan H. Stafford

quotes.quote: Smoking is just like farting with the poisonous elements.
quotes.author: Skai Chan

quotes.quote: Smoking is one of the leading causes of all statistics.
quotes.author: Liza Minnelli

quotes.quote: Much smoking kills live men and cures dead swine.
quotes.author: George D. Prentice

quotes.quote: Every time you light up a cigarette, you are saying that your life isn't worth living.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No one can quit smoking for you, or make you want to change your life. No one can make you do anything that you don't want to do.
quotes.author: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.quote: Today just might be the best day to start seriously thinking about quitting smoking.
quotes.author: Alexander Woollcott

quotes.quote: To quit smoking, you must first want to quit, but then you must also do the quitting.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Quitting smoking is rather a marathon than a sprint. It is not a one-time attempt, but a longer effort.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Quitting cigarettes might be the hardest thing to do in life, but at least you will have one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You're always better off if you quit smoking; it's never too late.
quotes.author: Loni Anderson

quotes.quote: Every time you try to quit smoking you are actually getting closer to staying smoke free.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: There's nothing quite like tobacco: it's the passion of decent folk, and whoever lives without tobacco doesn't deserve to live.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: A cigarette is the only consumer product which when used as directed kills its consumer.
quotes.author: Gro Brundtland

quotes.quote: Smoking is hateful to the nose, harmful to the brain, and dangerous to the lungs.
quotes.author: King James I

quotes.quote: Smoking is suicide by instalments.
quotes.author: H.M. Forester

quotes.quote: Smoking is neither an art nor a sport. Better to liberate yourself before the body retaliates, for its vengeance would be a furious blow enthused out of all the bygone years' mercy you thanklessly thought you were entitled to.
quotes.author: Lukhman Pambra

quotes.quote: The true face of smoking is disease, death and horror â€“ not the glamor and sophistication the pushers in the tobacco industry try to portray.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: Rather than you smoking a cigarette, the cigarette is really smoking you.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Smoking must be harder than not smoking. For the latter does not require any action.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: If you resolve to give up smoking, drinking, and loving, you don't actually live longer; it just seems longer.
quotes.author: Clement Freud

quotes.quote: Cigarettes are a classy way to commit suicide.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: If quitting smoking seems hard right now, it is exactly what you should start doing.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best way to stop smoking is to just stop â€“ no ifs, and or butts.
quotes.author: Edith Zettler

quotes.quote: Quitting smoking can be a very good test of ones character. Pass the test and you will have accomplished so much more than just get rid of one bad habit.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: It is easier to prevent bad habits than to break them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Smoking kills half of all lifetime smokers.
quotes.author: Alex Bobak

quotes.quote: If knowing about the dangers of smoking were enough, almost no one would smoke.
quotes.author: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.quote: Not only will giving up cigarettes put more money in your pocket, your body will thank you for it.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Cigarette smoking is clearly identified as the chief, preventable cause of death in our society.
quotes.author: C. Everett Koop

quotes.quote: Don't think you get nothing from quitting. You get guilt, anger, depression, confusion, etc...Never said they were feelings you wanted.
quotes.author: Nicholas James O'Callaghan

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Quitting is the easiest thing to do.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: You can always quit, so why quit now.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: When your own mind tells you to quit, you must ignore your negative thoughts and press on.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Strategic quitting is the secret of successful organizations
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Failing is not the worst thing in the world; quitting is.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: It's always too early to quit.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Most people who succeed in the face of seemingly impossible conditions are people who simply don't know how to quit.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: A man is not finished when he is defeated. He is finished when he quits.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Quit now, you'll never make it. If you disregard this advice, you'll be halfway there.
quotes.author: David Zucker

quotes.quote: Rest but never quit. Even the sun has a sinking spell each evening. But it always rises the next morning. At sunrise, every soul is born again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One of the most common causes of failure is the habit of quitting when one is overtaken by temporary defeat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: A quitter never wins and a winner never quits.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Never Quit.... Never ever Quit... You might feel weak when there is someone stronger and more skilled than you are, but if you don't quit there is a chance to prove your determination.... but quitting makes you lose already
quotes.author: Swetha Dhanagari

quotes.quote: Quitting is not the answer. Life is not fair, and you can't quit every time something unfair happens to you.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: Quitting is a hiccup for losers. And down they go.
quotes.author: Lorenz Font

quotes.quote: Of all the stratagems, to know when to quit is the best.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Success can be defined in many ways but failure in only one ... quitting!
quotes.author: Gerard de Marigny

quotes.quote: Next time you want to quit, think who you want to be. Quitters never win.
quotes.author: Julie Hebert

quotes.quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: The man who gives up accomplishes nothing and is only a hindrance. The man who does not give up can move mountains.
quotes.author: Ernest Hello

quotes.quote: Things can always get worse, but only quitters quit!
quotes.author: Nina Sakura

quotes.quote: Quitting is leading too.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: The problem with self-improvement is knowing when to quit.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: Quiz the few poor treasures hid there, con the letters kept by me.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Oh never quiz the lovely lady in the street!
quotes.author: Frederick William (FW) Harvey

quotes.quote: Catch it and quiz it, is my topic.
quotes.author: Rakim

quotes.quote: It ain't that I'm questionin' you. To take part in any quiz.
quotes.author: Fairport Convention

quotes.quote: When I hear that pop quiz, that's the way I was raised and that's the way it is for.
quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G

quotes.quote: The trouble with school is they give you the answer, then they give you the exam. That's not life.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Life is not a multiple choice test, it's an open-book essay exam.
quotes.author: Alan Blinder

quotes.quote: When students cheat on exams it's because our school system values grades more than students value learning.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: You may flunk your exams in school and still make it in life, but if you flunk life's exams, you're sunk!
quotes.author: Chris Oyakhilome

quotes.quote: In life, the classroom is everywhere. The exam comes at the very end.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen
